Felippe Regazio

Web Development taken seriously

Howdy! My name is Felippe Regazio, I'm a passionate web developer - Front End Specialist, Development Generalist and Open sourcerer. In short: a strange carbon-based lifeform. I'm the creator of CV Keep and other open source projects like Plume-CSS, 1POST, LogFlake, Express-i18n-Middleware an others, in addition to being an active FOSS community member.

I usually write code for large apps with mixed stacks and high traffic such as content portals, Software as a Service apps, industrial scale CMSes, chatbots and AI assistants. I have worked and collaborated with companies like Pismo, mLabs, TSC BR/France, Havaianas BR/USA, HBO, Dell and many others.

I grew up using the internet trying my first lines of code at 14, so I'm mostly a self-taught developer. I believe in software development as a creative and social-driven profession, once every software is a tool focused on a community and its context. I believe in hard work, study, research and method as ingredients to deliver the best possible results.

Find me at
